arknights:UrsusBreadRelic.NAME: 乌萨斯列巴
arknights:UrsusBreadRelic.FLAVOR: 一种来自乌萨斯的食物，吃起来有一股子浓烈的发酵味儿。就是酸。
DESCRIPTIONS: 每场战斗开始时，额外抽1张牌。

arknights:StereoProjectorRelic.NAME: 个人避难所
arknights:StereoProjectorRelic.FLAVOR: 哥伦比亚的科技公司“约翰老妈”提供给拓荒者的个人防护掩体，然而拓荒者要是有钱买这个就不会去当拓荒者了......
DESCRIPTIONS: 拾取时，获得6点 #y最大生命值 。

arknights:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

arknights:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
arknights:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

arknights:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
